Uses of Interface
org.apache.tiles.core.prepare.factory.PreparerFactory

  • Packages that use PreparerFactory 
    Package Description
    org.apache.struts2.tiles  
    org.apache.tiles.core.factory
    Factory classes, to allow creation of container instances.
    org.apache.tiles.core.impl
    It contains the basic implementations of Tiles container.
    org.apache.tiles.core.prepare.factory
    "View preparers" are objects that allows the "preparation" of a Tiles artifact (definition, template or attribute) before it is rendered.
    It is useful, for example, when a view item should be built and stored in a particular context (e.g.
